title: Mac OS X Freeware Essentials [b410]
description:
## Mac OS X Freeware Essentials v1.0 ##

HOW TO INSTALL
1. Download the .dmg file
2. Mount the .dmg file
3. Open the Installer inside the .dmg
4. Select the packages you want to install
5. Install!


md5 checksum of the .dmg is c0f108f61443a6f09eab5ecd84447271


-- SOME SCREENSHOTZ -- <a href="
http://bayimg.com/eaCPhaacb" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://bayimg.com/eaCPhaacb</a>
http://bayimg.com/EaCPGAaCb


!! Most of the applications are Leopard Only so is required Mac OS X 10.5.4 or later to run the installer !!

Well, i know, some softwares are missing ( OpenOffice, Neoofice, Vuze ) but i had some problems including them in the installer, if you need them , you can google and download them :-)


== All softwares are property of their own developers, i just put them toghether and made an installer ==
